title: Blood Pressure Notepad
remove_add_subtitle: Advertising is the only source of my income, thank you for your support
rating_on_googleplay_subtitle: Thank you for your comments and support
alarm_textfield_emptycontext1: Please enter the name of the drug
alarm_textfield_emptycontext2: Dosage must be greater than zero
ocr_screen_content_warning: Click the camera icon in the upper right corner to provide a photo
disclaimer_content: This application may contain information about certain medical conditions, medical treatments and products. Such information is provided for informational purposes only and does not contain advertising or intentions regarding the use of any medication, treatment or oral product and is not a substitute for consultation with a physician or other qualified medical professional. You may not use the information contained herein for medical treatment, problem solving in health care, or diagnosis of disease. You must ensure that you always consult with a physician or other qualified medical professional. You agree that OkFit will not be liable for any direct or indirect damages resulting from your use of and/or reliance on the Application Content, products, information or information, and disclaims all warranties, express or implied, as to the accuracy, currency, suitability of the Application Content and the products, methods, information or other materials referenced therein.
bp_screen_helper_content: Here are two ways to help you record your blood pressure: 1. Click on the text input box above to record your blood pressure through Siri voice recognition. 2. Enter it manually by clicking on the numbers below
bp_screen_textfield_title:
Voice Recognition Record (English not supported)
Click the microphone icon in the lower right corner of the keyboard to convert speech to text
Example: Say 'Systolic 128, Diastolic 86'
steps_screen_textfield_title:
Voice Recognition Record (English not supported)
Click the microphone icon in the lower right corner of the keyboard to convert speech to text
Example: 'Walked 1000 steps today'
sleep_screen_textfield_title:
Voice Recognition Record
Click the microphone icon in the lower right corner of the keyboard to convert speech to text
Example: Say 'Slept well today, slept for 3 hours'
quality_air_screen_textfield_title:
Record How You Feel
Example: Say 'I had bleeding and feel discomfort breathing and I can feel as I move my throat'
bp_screen_voice_failed_content: No blood pressure information found in your voice input. If you need to use manual input, please clear the content in the input box first
